h3.a: HISD ~ PreK -12th grade Grading Policy for the 4th 9 Weeks 2020

div.p:
PreK-2nd grade packets will require one grade per week per subject. For students grades 3-12,
weekly assignments will be posted in google classrooms and 2 assignments per subject will be
given and graded each week. All assignments will have the same weight and weekly feedback
will be given to those students on how well they did on each one. No new assignments will be
given after May 15th. The week of May 18th will be utilized for students needing to turn in late
work or redoing assignments to meet required passing standard. No tests or final exams will be
administered this 9 weeks. Virtual instruction will end on May 21st, in correlation with the
scheduled year end.

h3.a: HISD ~ Families First Coronavirus Response Act

div.p:
The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA or Act) requires certain employers to provide their
employees with paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19.
These provisions will apply from April 1, 2020 through December 31, 2020.
